CustomField.description: Please enter an expiration date only if you need the system to expire it automatically at a future date. Otherwise use the Deactivate button to cancel the backup/delegate immediately.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter an expiration date only if you need the system to expire it automatically at a future date. Otherwise use the Deactivate button on the next screen to cancel the backup immediately
CustomField.label: Expiration Date
